author: Sam Bourgi
title: Coronavirus to Devour Texas Economy Before Spreading Throughout America
description: The Dallas Fed's manufacturing survey paints a bleak picture of the post-coronavirus U.S. economy - and sends a strong signal that the worst is yet to come. The post Coronavirus to Devour Texas Economy Before Spreading Throughout America appeared first on CCN…
content:
• The Dallas Feds monthly manufacturing index crashed to record lows in March, and to levels not seen since the 2008-09 financial crisis.
  • Coronavirus is accelerating the loss of U.S. manufacturing as production, new orders and capacity utilizati… [+5010 chars]
